(3) West Godavari District, Achanta Mandal, Achanta Vemavaram Village, House No. 8-80 The deed of partition was signed by the following persons: Suresh (aged 33 years), the youngest son of Kodamanchili (late) Subbarao, all of whom are jointly and severally divided. One of us is the wife of Kodamanchili Subbarao. She is the current head of the family. Two or three of us are the descendants of the said Sri Kodamanchili Subbarao and Nagaratnam, and we are siblings. _
The property acquired and inherited by the head of our family, Sri Kodamanchili Subbarao, shall be enjoyed by them with full rights during their lifetime and shall not be transferred to anyone. After his untimely death without making any written will, after his life, we, the next heirs of the said Kodamanchili Subbarao, have jointly inherited the said property and from that date to this day, one of us has been acting as the head of a Hindu undivided family, managing the said property and the income arising from the said property ourselves and spending it on our joint family. In the present circumstances, rather than enjoying the said property jointly, it is more appropriate for us to divide it and manage it ourselves, so our family members, in the presence of the elders, have divided the said property into two unequal shares and thus

"Kodamanchili Nagaratnam", "Kodamanchili Suresh" garu and the remaining assets in the said joint property till date in cash:
> Rs. 11,80,000/- worth "B" mark schedule share to the second of us
"Kodamanchili Raju" garu and the assets to which they have come are to be taken over by them on this day itself._
Our joint family has no dues from the world. There are no debts to be paid to others from our joint family. From today onwards, no one has any connection with the wealth and debts of one person._
From now on, the property that has come to their share, they should enjoy it separately, their sons and grandsons, that moon star, happiness, freely, according to their wishes, with all the powers of donation, oppression, exchange, sale, etc. From now on, all the taxes that are due to the government on the real estate that has come to our shares, they should pay them themselves, regardless of who the other shareholders are._
We will never be able to make any kind of claim to each other regarding the shares that we have divided earlier, whether they are higher or lower, or whether there are any disadvantages, or whether the shares should be exchanged for each other. Except for the assets mentioned here, we will divide the following There are no joint family properties to be claimed. There are no other rights or heirs to these properties except us.
Therefore, none of us, without the knowledge of each other, has transferred to anyone any mortgages, charges, leases, guarantees, agreements, etc., or any other written or unwritten encumbrances, including valid court seizures, injections, manovarti guarantees, bank securities, deposit of title deeds, etc., over the said scheduled properties.

sections.content: The property acquired by Kodamanchili Raju, by virtue of Partition Deed No. 1084 of 2019, dated 14-Mar-2019, of the Schedule-B, the Property admeasuring an extent of 175.5 Sq. Yds. bearing house number 8-88/B, comprised in survey number 506-4, situated in Achanta Vemavaram Village, and Gramapanchayath, Achanta Mandal, withinthe District of West Godavari, registered at sub-registrar office Penugonda, is bounded as follows: North by: 40.6 Ft. Panchayathi Road South by: 40.6 Ft. Panta Bodi East by: 39 Ft. Property of Pasala Ramarao West by: 39 Ft. Property of Piparapalli Mariyya Note It is to be noted that our legal verification is limited towards the property offered as security for the purpose of loan, i.e., of the Schedule-B property of the Partition Deed. Note Schedule property is part of Gramakantam as per recitals of the deed.

The aforementioned Kodamanchili Raju, executed a Mortgage Deed on 30-Sep-2020, registered as document No. 5549 of 2020, before the SRO Tanuku, in favour of M/S Five Star Business Finance Limited, towards the property measuring 175.5 Sq. Yds. situated in Achanta Vemavaram.[Ref:EC]

Note It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
